sentences.english: The therapy programs in the double-blinded trial and open-label trail are the same.
sentences.chinese: 开放试验和双盲试验遵循同一研究方案。

sentences.english: The results were double blind compared and evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 采用双盲法对两者检测结果进行比较。

sentences.english: Double blind test was used in whole experiment.
Moreover, results were confirmed by double-blind analysis.
sentences.chinese: 经双盲重复检测，结果一致。

sentences.english: Despite study limitations, including double-blind evaluation limited to 6 months, William T.
sentences.chinese: 虽然研究有局限性，包括双盲的评价只进行了6个月。

sentences.english: The device can be used in double-blind experiments, and also operated by individual operator.
sentences.chinese: 该装置可以用于在双盲实验，并也由单个操作员操作。

sentences.english: Double blind was used in the experiment.
The answer is the "gold standard" double blind, placebo controlled study.
sentences.chinese: 答案是“金标准”，双盲，安慰剂对照研究。

sentences.english: Methods Through the experimental design of double-blind, chiasm and comparison.
sentences.chinese: 采用双盲交叉对比实验设计。

sentences.english: The result were got from a relevant professional physician's blinded independent film-reading.
sentences.chinese: 由一名相关专业医师进行双盲独立阅片，并得出结果。

sentences.english: Methods The effects of zinc supplementation were assessed in a double-blinded randomized control design.
sentences.chinese: 方法随机双盲对照法补锌干预研究。

definition: subject (in an experiment)/participant (in a clinical trial etc)
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
base (of a triangle)/base line (in geodetic survey)/horizontal

pinyin: gong1 neng2 xing4 ci2 gong4 zhen4 cheng2 xiang4
